headline: AI Is Redefining Tech Infrastructure Priorities: Seagate Report Calls for Balance Between Cost and Carbon
summary: FREMONT, Calif., April 16, 2025--Seagate's new report highlights AI-driven data storage demand and calls for unified sustainability in data centers to balance cost and carbon.
